DOC.brief_summary: Alive & Thrive initiative aim improve infant young child feed practice reduce childhood stunt . In Vietnam , Alive & Thrive 's primary intervention implement social franchise link government 's health system . The impact evaluation conduct use cluster-randomized design 20 commune health center ( CHC ) assign social franchise model , 20 CHC assign routine government service . Repeated cross-sectional baseline endline survey use assess public health impact intervention . The baseline 2010 endline survey community conduct 2014 . Mixed method process evaluation conduct 2011 , 2012 2013 study pathways program impact achieve .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Evaluation Social Franchise Model Improving Infant Young Child Feeding Child Nutrition Vietnam
